content: Yes, Dan Sofer and Anni Rowland-Campbell are related - they are brother and sister. Anni Rowland-Campbell is a co-founder of the organization with Dan Sofer, and together they have played a key role in shaping the vision and mission of Founders and Coders. Anni has a background in service design and has worked in the tech industry for many years, while Dan has a background in web development and has been involved with various tech startups over the years. Their complementary skill sets and shared vision for creating a more inclusive and equitable tech industry have been critical to the success of Founders and Coders.
